overview: Sex therapist, Chad White helps a variety of clients work through their sexual issues. The only problem is, he doesn't have anybody to work through his own. At home, his once-sexually driven wife isn't interested in passionate sex anymore and his need to connect to a woman is becoming problematic for their marriage. These marital problems become even more evident when he finds himself drawn to Olive, a patient of his that's afraid of intimacy. The two forge a flirtatious friendship that ultimately him to make tough decisions about both his marriage and about what and whom he ultimately wants in life.
title: The Sex Therapist
